name: sturdy

effect.x_y: Does not prevent regular KOs from full HP.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Does not prevent regular KOs from full HP.

short_effect: Prevents being KOed from full HP, leaving 1 HP instead. Protects against the one-hit KO moves regardless of HP.

flavor_text.x_y: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.
